entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border overnight near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
